name: weme-ui/std
description: The standard components for Weme UI

items.name: #init
items.title: Init
items.description: Init dependencies and utils for Weme UI.

items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: Used to show and hide sections of related content on a page.

items.name: action-sheet
items.title: Action Sheet
items.description: Used to display a bottom action sheet with a set of actions.

items.name: affix
items.title: Affix
items.description: Used to fix an element to a specific position.

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: Used to communicate a state that affects a system, feature or page.

items.name: anchor
items.title: Anchor
items.description: Used to create an anchor links to quickly navigate to a specific section of a page.

items.name: app
items.title: App
items.description: Used to globally configure the app.

items.name: aspect-ratio
items.title: Aspect Ratio
items.description: Maintain a consistent aspect ratio for embedding videos, images, maps, etc.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: Used to represent user profile picture or initials.

items.name: avatar-group
items.title: Avatar Group
items.description: Used to display a group of avatars.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Used to highlight an item's status for quick recognition.

items.name: banner
items.title: Banner
items.description: Used to display a banner at the top of the page.

items.name: bar-code
items.title: Bar Code
items.description: Used to display a bar code.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Used to display a page's location within a site's hierarchical structure.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Used to trigger an action or event.

items.name: button-group
items.title: Button Group
items.description: Used to group buttons together.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Used to display content related to a single subject.

items.name: carousel
items.title: Carousel
items.description: Used to cycle through a series of visual content within a container.

items.name: clipboard
items.title: Clipboard
items.description: Used to copy text to the clipboard.

items.name: collapsible
items.title: Collapsible
items.description: Used to expand and collapse additional content.

items.name: comment
items.title: Comment
items.description: Used to display a comment.

items.name: context-menu
items.title: Context Menu
items.description: Used to display a menu on right-click.

items.name: data-list
items.title: Data List
items.description: Used to display a list of similar data items.

items.name: dropdown
items.title: Dropdown
items.description: Used to create an accessible dropdown menu.

items.name: float
items.title: Float
items.description: Used to anchor an element to the edge of a container.

items.name: form
items.title: Form
items.description: Used to wrap a group of form elements.

items.name: group
items.title: Group
items.description: Used to group and attach elements together.

items.name: highlight
items.title: Highlight
items.description: Used to emphasize specific words or phrases within a larger body of text.

items.name: icon
items.title: Icon
items.description: Used to display an svg icon from Iconify.

items.name: icon-box
items.title: Icon Box
items.description: Used to display an icon with a colorful box.

items.name: icon-button
items.title: Icon Button
items.description: Used to render an icon within a button.

items.name: image
items.title: Image
items.description: Used to display images.

items.name: image-preview
items.title: Image Preview
items.description: Used to preview images.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: Used to get user input in a text field.

items.name: item
items.title: Item
items.description: Used to display any content.

items.name: item-group
items.title: Item Group
items.description: Used to group a list of items.

items.name: kbd
items.title: Kbd
items.description: Used to show key combinations for an action.

items.name: lens
items.title: Lens
items.description: Used to zoom into images, videos, or practically anything.

items.name: link-overlay
items.title: Link Overlay
items.description: Used to stretch a link over a container.

items.name: marquee
items.title: Marquee
items.description: Used to create infinite scrolling content.

items.name: modal
items.title: Modal
items.description: Used to display a dialog prompt.

items.name: number-input
items.title: Number Input
items.description: Used to enter a number, and increment or decrement the value using stepper buttons.

items.name: number-ticker
items.title: Number Ticker
items.description: Used to display animated number up or down to a target number.

items.name: overflow
items.title: Overflow
items.description: Used to control the overflow behavior of its children.

items.name: overlay
items.title: Overlay
items.description: Used to display content on top of other content.

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Used to navigate through a series of pages.

items.name: password-input
items.title: Password Input
items.description: Used to input secure text like password and api-keys.

items.name: password-strength-meter
items.title: Password Strength Meter
items.description: Used to display the strength of a password.

items.name: pin-input
items.title: Pin Input
items.description: Used to capture a pin code or otp from the user.

items.name: pop-confirm
items.title: Pop Confirm
items.description: Used to confirm an action.

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: Used to show detailed information inside a pop-up.

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Used to display the progress status for a task.

items.name: qr-code
items.title: Qr Code
items.description: Used to generate and display QR code.

items.name: result
items.title: Result
items.description: Used to indicate when a resource is empty or unavailable.

items.name: scroll-area
items.title: Scroll Area
items.description: Used to create a scrollable area with virtualization support.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Used to visually separate content.

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: Used to render a placeholder while the content is loading.

items.name: spinner
items.title: Spinner
items.description: Used to provide a visual cue that an action is processing

items.name: stack
items.title: Stack
items.description: Used to layout its children in a vertical or horizontal stack.

items.name: stat
items.title: Stat
items.description: Used to display a statistic with a title and value.

items.name: status
items.title: Status
items.description: Used to indicate the status of a process or state.

items.name: steps
items.title: Steps
items.description: Used to indicate progress through a multi-step process.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: Used to capture a binary state.

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: Used to display data in a tabular format.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: Used to display content in a tabbed interface.

items.name: tag
items.title: Tag
items.description: Used for categorizing or labeling content.

items.name: tags-input
items.title: Tags Input
items.description: Used to enter multiple values as tags with features like tag creation, deletion, and keyboard navigation.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: Used to enter multiple lines of text.

items.name: theme
items.title: Theme
items.description: Used to provide theme configuration.

items.name: timeline
items.title: Timeline
items.description: Used to display a list of events in chronological order.

items.name: timer
items.title: Timer
items.description: Used to record the time elapsed since a specific start time.

items.name: toast
items.title: Toast
items.description: Used to display a temporary message to the user.

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: Used to toggle between two states.

items.name: toggle-tooltip
items.title: Toggle Tooltip
items.description: Looks like a tooltip, but works like a popover.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: Used to display additional information when a user hovers over an element.
